column2: Reporting to the Associate Director - Electrical, this role will work in collaboration with local and global teams to meet the objectives     The ideal candidate will have experience in designing and managing projects, and must have knowledge to work on Excel, ETAP, Amtech, Navis, and BIM 360     Experience in data centre design is also critical for this role                   We have ambitious growth plans, so key priorities will include:         Developing skills, knowledge, and experience in electrical services and other disciplines     Planning, organising, and coordinating all disciplines     Thinking and decision making with assistance where required     Communication in clear terms, both oral and written     Teamwork and leadership are keys to success at this level     This is a hands-on role, working closely with several global teams alongside local leaders and engineering teams to ensure the required level of resource is in place to deliver the objectives and KPIs of projects.             Responsibilities        Works mainly without supervision; refers upwards as necessary     Monitors budgets and controlling expenditure to meet financial targets for own areas     Promotes innovation     Sets and meets agreed deadlines     Allocates tasks and coordinates activities     Represents the group / office / discipline / profession internally and externally     Authors official documents e.g., letters and reports for internal or external use         May, in addition, be responsible for one or more of the following:         Manages projects, work area, or technical skill set     Predicts and plans future resources which may include setting up new projects and project plans     Designs or delivers events, activities, processes, and/or projects which have a major impact on the management of the business     Oversees performance and development of others, providing guidance, training, and motivational and directional feedback           Qualifications        A Bachelors degree in Electrical Building Services Engineering from an appropriate education institute, or equivalent qualification or sufficient experience     Experience in data centre design is critical for this role         Developing skills, knowledge, and experience           Taking the initiative in developing self and career; continuously assessing own abilities and aspirations, and evaluates them against suitable development and career opportunities within Black & White; fostering the long-term learning and development of others, and has a focus on the development intent and effect rather than on the formal role of training; striving to advance technical skills which differentiate Black & White from competitors; and demonstrating skill and technical competence in the discipline             Commits to own and others continuing professional development     Actively develops the knowledge, experience, and skills of others, including those in other groups or offices e.g., acts as a mentor or coach, delivers training events, etc.     Being sought out by others within and outside Black & White for their professional and technical expertise     Supports the technical committee and drives or leads on technical initiatives     Brings wide and varied experience to their professional or technical area e.g., experience in working in different locations     Promotes quality of delivery; strives to get it right first time, every time         Planning and Organising         Identifying objectives clearly, planning actions, allocating tasks, and monitoring progress; coordinating with and informing others as necessary; having the ability to juggle different conflicting demands and priorities; and ensuring delivery is planned to include sufficient time for QA or QC.     Adopts simplicity in approach to problems and solutions     Liaises with other teams, the customer, and other external partners to organise everyone s time efficiently     Makes significant changes in own area to meet strategic needs     Is realistic about own and others capabilities     Ensures people have the investment/resources/training they need to carry out their jobs and projects     Switches quickly between different levels of thinking to be able to stand back and see the big picture     Runs meetings efficiently, issues agendas in good time, ensures subjects are covered and actions taken         Thinking and Decision Making         Analytical, creative, and conceptual thinking; the ability to evaluate options, consider the consequences and implications, reach conclusions, and make recommendations and decisions.     Deals with complex escalated problems within own area     Creates new or better operational processes     Makes time to review projects to identify and learn from successes and problems     Thinks beyond the immediate task in hand and considers the impact of decisions further down the line     Challenges existing working practices and suggests improvements     Identifies patterns and trends and recommends action     Provides in-depth analysis of problems and proposes solutions     Brings others in to contribute to solutions     Fosters the development of new ideas in others         Commercial Awareness and Acumen         Understanding the importance of financial success and the willingness or ability to act in the interest of achieving it; negotiating the best terms for Black & White; managing legal and contractual aspects; and desiring to work efficiently, as time is money.     Ensures Black & White competes effectively through a thorough understanding of external market conditions (fees, scope of service, conditions)     Includes contingency allowances in negotiated fees/costs/budgets     Benchmarks fees or costs against market rates     Works to minimise costs and risks, and maximise income     Demonstrates good commercial judgement, evaluating risks and making recommendations to reject commercially unattractive opportunities     Negotiates most favourable contractual and financial terms and conditions with customers or suppliers     Considers alternative fee structures, minimizes or caps the liability of Black & White in any agreement     Knows what the One Global Team approach can offer and promotes this to the customers     Understands Black & White s financial bidding processes and complies with them     Delegates work to achieve best value     Tenaciously chases cash for own projects         Building Customer/Client Relationships         The desire to delight customers (may be other individuals or offices within Black & White) by concentrating on discovering, understanding, and satisfying needs; networking, bringing people, opportunities, and activities together; and arranging win/win solutions.     Acts with integrity, is straight-talking, respectful, and fair     Liaises with customers, keeps them informed, seeks feedback, listens to complaints and praise, manages expectations, and responds appropriately     Keeps in touch with customers between projects     Tailors service offered to customers needs (real and perceived)     Is firm with customers when appropriate without causing unnecessary confrontation     Identifies influencers and decision makers     Thinks of how a person can be of value to other people they know     Invests own time in fostering relationships with external business associates     Proactively looks for potential issues and activities in terms of public relations         Communication         Receiving, interpreting, and imparting information and ideas, both written and spoken, to a wide range of people, influencing others.     Uses every means (visual aids, working models, etc.) to make presentations exciting and interesting     Identifies the key issues and communicates them concisely and simply     Uses language appropriate to the audience e.g., does not use technical or professional jargon when communicating with people from different disciplines or professions     Adapts communication to other cultural styles     Asks questions to ensure others have understood what they need to do     Explains complex concepts in simple terms     Persuades through debate and logical argument in a non- adversarial way     When appropriate, tells people honestly and positively things they don t want to know     Communicates appropriately sensitive and confidential matters between staff     Mediates disagreements between parties and negotiates work that compromises the benefit of all         Teamwork and Leadership         Working in a group in a complementary fashion, which when effective, produces a holistic solution; liaising and cooperating with others; and being aware of own and others strengths and weaknesses.     Treats everyone with respect, irrespective of their level, background, gender, or discipline or profession     Supports others, even when they have made mistakes     Identifies and actions training needs (own and others)     Motivates without formal authority e.g., initiatives spanning across several groups     Spots when tasks or projects are going off the rails and intervenes or assists in good time     Deals with people s issues fairly and consistently     Strengthens team by incorporating specialists     Incorporates existing staff into the team even if they have less than an ideal profile     Actively supports and implements business or management systems           Our Values         Accountability: Everyone is accountable.     Integrity: We are straight-talking, respectful, and fair.     Simplicity: Both in our approach and solutions.     Supportive: We are approachable, inclusive, and we recognise success.     Quality: We strive to get it right first time, every time.             Our Strategic Themes         Client first     One Global Team     Employer of Choice     Growth     Innovation

column2: Job   Profile:   Electrical   Engineer Location:   Nagpur Job   Summary:  We are seeking a skilled and experienced Electrical Engineer to join our construction team. The Electrical Engineer will be responsible for designing, developing, and overseeing the installation of electrical systems in various construction projects. The role requires a strong understanding of electrical engineering principles, construction processes, and safety standards. Company   Overview:   Infratech   Construction   Company  is a leading construction firm based in Nagpur, specializing in delivering high-quality infrastructure projects across various sectors. With a strong commitment to excellence and innovation, Infratech has established itself as a trusted name in the construction industry, known for its technical expertise, project management capabilities, and customer-centric approach. Key   Responsibilities: 1.  Design   and   Development: 1. Develop electrical designs and plans based on project requirements and specifications. 2. Create detailed electrical schematics, diagrams, and blueprints using CAD software. 3. Ensure designs comply with local, state, and national electrical codes and standards. 2.  Project   Management: 1. Collaborate with project managers, architects, and other engineers to integrate electrical systems into overall project plans. 2. Assist in the planning and scheduling of electrical work to ensure timely project completion. 3. Monitor project progress and adjust plans as necessary to meet project goals. 3.  Installation   and   Implementation: 1. Oversee the installation of electrical systems, including wiring, lighting, power distribution, and control systems. 2. Conduct site inspections to ensure electrical installations meet design specifications and safety standards. 3. Coordinate with contractors and subcontractors to ensure efficient and quality workmanship. 4.  Quality   Assurance   and   Safety: 1. Implement quality control procedures to ensure all electrical work meets high standards of quality and safety. 2. Conduct regular inspections and tests to verify the functionality and safety of electrical systems. 3. Address and resolve any issues or deficiencies in a timely manner. 5.  Compliance   and   Documentation: 1. Ensure all electrical work complies with relevant codes, regulations, and standards. 2. Maintain accurate records of electrical designs, installations, inspections, and maintenance activities. 3. Prepare and submit necessary documentation for project approvals and permits. 6.  Technical   Support   and   Troubleshooting: 1. Provide technical support and guidance to project teams and clients. 2. Diagnose and troubleshoot electrical issues, proposing effective solutions. 3. Stay updated with the latest developments in electrical engineering and construction technologies. 7.  Client   and   Stakeholder   Communication: 1. Communicate effectively with clients, providing regular updates on project status and addressing any concerns. 2. Collaborate with stakeholders to ensure project requirements and expectations are met. Qualifications: 1. Bachelors degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field. 2. Minimum of 4-7 years of experience in electrical engineering, preferably in the construction industry. 3. Strong knowledge of electrical systems, codes, regulations, and standards. 4. Proficiency in CAD software and other relevant engineering tools. 5. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. 6. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. 7. Professional Engineer (PE) license is preferred but not required. 8. Experience with sustainable building practices and LEED certification. 9. Familiarity with Building Information Modeling (BIM) technology.

column2: Job Title: Design Engineer - Solar EPC (Electrical) Location:  Noida, India Experience:  3-8 years Industry:  Renewable Energy/Engineering/Construction Job Description: As a Design Engineer specializing in solar EPC electrical, you will play a crucial role in the design and engineering of electrical systems for solar power projects. Working closely with our project management and engineering teams, you will be responsible for ensuring the efficient and reliable operation of solar photovoltaic (PV) systems, from concept to commissioning. Responsibilities: System Design and Engineering:  Design electrical systems for solar PV projects, including layout design, cable sizing, equipment selection, and electrical schematics. Ensure compliance with relevant codes, standards, and industry best practices. Technical Documentation:  Prepare detailed engineering drawings, specifications, and technical documents for electrical components and systems. Review and interpret construction drawings and specifications to support project execution. Equipment Procurement Support:  Collaborate with the procurement team to select and procure electrical equipment, such as inverters, transformers, switchgear, and cables. Evaluate supplier proposals and technical specifications to ensure compatibility and quality. Interdisciplinary Coordination:  Coordinate with civil, mechanical, and structural engineers to integrate electrical designs into overall project plans. Address interdisciplinary design challenges and ensure seamless integration of electrical systems with other project components. Quality Assurance and Compliance:  Conduct quality checks and inspections to verify the integrity and functionality of electrical installations. Ensure compliance with relevant regulatory requirements, safety standards, and project specifications. Technical Support:  Provide technical support to project managers, site engineers, and construction teams during project execution. Resolve technical issues, deviations, and design changes in a timely and efficient manner. Continuous Improvement:  Stay updated on emerging technologies, industry trends, and best practices in solar PV and electrical engineering. Identify opportunities for process improvement, optimization, and innovation in design methodologies. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or related field. Proven experience of 3-8 years in electrical design and engineering, with a focus on solar EPC projects. Proficiency in electrical design software such as PVsyst, AutoCAD Electrical, ETAP, or equivalent. Strong understanding of electrical principles, power systems, and solar PV technology. Familiarity with relevant codes and standards such as NEC, IEEE, IEC, and local electrical regulations. Excellent analytical skills and attention to detail, with the ability to troubleshoot complex electrical systems. Effective communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate across multidisciplinary teams. Self-motivated and proactive, with a passion for renewable energy and sustainability. Willingness to travel to project sites and occasionally work in challenging outdoor environments

column2: Rcad Consulting Engineers Private Limited  is looking for Electrical Site Engineers  to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     A Site Engineer, also known as a Construction Site Engineer or Field Engineer, is a professional who oversees construction projects at the site level      They play a critical role in ensuring the successful execution of construction plans and coordinating various activities on-site      Here are some key responsibilities of a Site Engineer:Project Planning and Execution: The Site Engineer works closely with project managers and stakeholders to understand project requirements, timelines, and specifications      They contribute to the development of project plans, schedules, and budgets      They ensure that construction activities are executed according to the plans and monitor progress to meet project milestones      Site Supervision: The Site Engineer is responsible for overseeing construction activities on-site      They manage and supervise the construction crew, contractors, and subcontractors, ensuring compliance with safety regulations, quality standards, and project specifications      They monitor and control work progress, resolve any issues or conflicts that arise, and ensure efficient utilization of resources      Quality Control: The Site Engineer ensures that construction work meets the required quality standards      They conduct regular inspections, perform quality checks, and ensure adherence to approved construction drawings and specifications      They identify and address any quality-related issues or deficiencies promptly      Material and Equipment Management: The Site Engineer is involved in managing construction materials, equipment, and resources on-site      They coordinate with suppliers, track inventory, and ensure timely availability of materials and equipment as per project requirements      They also oversee the proper handling, storage, and usage of materials and equipment to minimize wastage and ensure safety      Documentation and Reporting: The Site Engineer maintains accurate and up-to-date project documentation      They prepare daily or weekly progress reports, record site activities, maintain records of work orders, change orders, and RFIs (Requests for Information)      They also document any issues, incidents, or variations from the original plans and report them to the project team

column2: Power Linkers Group is looking for Electrical Engineer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey   The designation shall Commensurate with past position and relevant experience to Power Linkers Business Activity.        Job Description / Responsibilities          1.0 Electrical Design Engineering:      For Power Equipment and Systems from 400KV to 415 V. Candidate shall have adequate knowledge of Power System Protection, selection, application and setting.      OR        2.0 Power System Engineer:      A candidate shall be conversant with Power System Analysis Software and Power System Studies such as Short circuit, load flow, relay setting and relay coordination, transient stability, arc flash studies etc. Hands-on experience with ETAP software shall be preferred.      OR        3.0 Field Testing and Commissioning Engineer:      A candidate shall have field experience in EHV-HV-MV Power system Equipment, including Power System protection, Testing Commissioning or Condition Monitoring Testing. This is an ON and OFF, On-site execution job.      OR        4.0 CMD Testing:      Candidates shall have experience in Condition Monitoring Testing of the majority of Power equipment. Candidates shall know the analysis and acceptability of Test results. This is an ON and OFF On-site job execution.        5.0    The candidate is expected to work in any one or more than one business activity of the organization depending upon experience, skills and proficiency.        6.0    Candidate shall have experience in either Power Plants, Petro-chemical, Oil & Gas plants, AL-CU smelters, Cement plants or any consulting engineers or service providers.        Desired profile of the candidate        An individual can be actively working OR may have taken VRS or even Retired but Physically and Mentally healthy to work without any strings for the next 5 years can also apply.        A candidate shall be a resident of Mumbai and Preferably residing between,        a. Churchgate to Bhayander, OR      b. CST (VT) to Thane, OR      These areas are approachable.      Diploma / B.E. / B. Tech / M.E. / M. Tech Electrical Engineer            Salary will commensurate with knowledge, experience and deliverables, including PF, Leave, and Bonus.          The cost of travel, and accommodation to various sites, will be paid/arranged by the company.          Site allowance will be given to compensate for food and other miscellaneous expenses.

Passion and purpose       :      Working at Sistema.bio, you work with a very passionate team that believes strongly in working for the social and environmental impact they want to see. Work-life balance       :      At Sistema.bio, we know you re at your best when you re rested and healthy. Gender Equality       : Sistema.     bio is committed to gender equality in the workplace. Thanks to our Gender policies and efforts women represent 57% of the Global team for example, and 27% of our overall workforce. Compile data and write reports regarding existing and potential engineering studies and projects.         Conduct field surveys and study maps, graphs, diagrams, and other data to identify and correct power system problems.         Speaking and listening to other engineers, team members and project managers, giving instructions to technicians and the ability to clearly communicate ideas and designs is essential.         As technology changes, electrical engineers need a habit of lifelong learning to keep up with innovation.         Electrical engineers work as part of a team with other engineers, technicians, project managers and report to upper management. Being a team player helps get the job done.         Ensuring projects meet safety regulations.         Maintaining project documentation.       Min Qualification: Diploma/B.Tech     Min Experience: 2-3 Years in same field

Checking of Electrical layouts like earthing, lighting, cable tray / trench, Fire alarm system, telephone system, public address system etc. Understanding / checking of substation automation system. Preparation of electrical equipment and bulk material requisitions, vendor offer review, preparation of technical bid tabulation etc. Vendor document review (Electrical equipment & bulk material). Coordination with other engineering disciplines for inputs and technical issues. Participates in Model Reviews and other project related workshops. Review of Subcontractors/ Vendor documents for technical compliance. Prepares cost estimates and quantity take offs. Support to filed engineering & Troubleshooting. Adhere to Corporate QHSE policy. MAIN TASKS: Preparation of Single line diagram. Preparation of material requisitions. Checking of electrical layouts Electrical vendor document review. Issue of deliverables with required quality as per project schedules. Providing inputs to drafting team and guiding them in preparing design drawings. Follow up of inter discipline comments and their resolution including clash resolution. Clarifications/solutions to site queries/issues. About You: Bachelors degree in electrical engineering, with at least 13+ years of relevant industry experience. Masters Degree in Engineering (M.E./M.Tech) shall be an added advantage. Conversant with ETAP, SEL and other Lighting software. Experience in Oil & Gas, Petrochemical, Fertilizer industries is preferred. Shall be well versed with Indian & International codes. Strong written and verbal communication skills in English is essential. Ability to foster communication within diverse cultural environments. WORK ENVIRONMENT: Spends most of time in a temperature-controlled office environment. If required shall go to site deputation/international deputation.

column2: Reporting to the Associate Director - Electrical, this role will work in collaboration with local and global teams to meet the objectives     The ideal candidate will have experience in designing and managing projects, and must have knowledge to work on Excel, ETAP, Amtech, Navis, and BIM 360     Experience in data centre design is also critical for this role                   We have ambitious growth plans, so key priorities will include:         Developing skills, knowledge, and experience in electrical services and other disciplines     Planning, organising, and coordinating all disciplines     Thinking and decision making with assistance where required     Communication in clear terms, both oral and written     Teamwork and leadership are keys to success at this level     This is a hands-on role, working closely with several global teams alongside local leaders and engineering teams to ensure the required level of resource is in place to deliver the objectives and KPIs of projects.             Responsibilities        Works mainly without supervision; refers upwards as necessary     Monitors budgets and controlling expenditure to meet financial targets for own areas     Promotes innovation     Sets and meets agreed deadlines     Allocates tasks and coordinates activities     Represents the group / office / discipline / profession internally and externally     Authors official documents e.g., letters and reports for internal or external use         May, in addition, be responsible for one or more of the following:         Manages projects, work area, or technical skill set     Predicts and plans future resources which may include setting up new projects and project plans     Designs or delivers events, activities, processes, and/or projects which have a major impact on the management of the business     Oversees performance and development of others, providing guidance, training, and motivational and directional feedback           Qualifications        A Bachelors degree in Electrical Building Services Engineering from an appropriate education institute, or equivalent qualification or sufficient experience     Experience in data centre design is critical for this role         Developing skills, knowledge, and experience           Taking the initiative in developing self and career; continuously assessing own abilities and aspirations, and evaluates them against suitable development and career opportunities within Black & White; fostering the long-term learning and development of others, and has a focus on the development intent and effect rather than on the formal role of training; striving to advance technical skills which differentiate Black & White from competitors; and demonstrating skill and technical competence in the discipline             Commits to own and others continuing professional development     Actively develops the knowledge, experience, and skills of others, including those in other groups or offices e.g., acts as a mentor or coach, delivers training events, etc.     Being sought out by others within and outside Black & White for their professional and technical expertise     Supports the technical committee and drives or leads on technical initiatives     Brings wide and varied experience to their professional or technical area e.g., experience in working in different locations     Promotes quality of delivery; strives to get it right first time, every time         Planning and Organising         Identifying objectives clearly, planning actions, allocating tasks, and monitoring progress; coordinating with and informing others as necessary; having the ability to juggle different conflicting demands and priorities; and ensuring delivery is planned to include sufficient time for QA or QC.     Adopts simplicity in approach to problems and solutions     Liaises with other teams, the customer, and other external partners to organise everyone s time efficiently     Makes significant changes in own area to meet strategic needs     Is realistic about own and others capabilities     Ensures people have the investment/resources/training they need to carry out their jobs and projects     Switches quickly between different levels of thinking to be able to stand back and see the big picture     Runs meetings efficiently, issues agendas in good time, ensures subjects are covered and actions taken         Thinking and Decision Making         Analytical, creative, and conceptual thinking; the ability to evaluate options, consider the consequences and implications, reach conclusions, and make recommendations and decisions.     Deals with complex escalated problems within own area     Creates new or better operational processes     Makes time to review projects to identify and learn from successes and problems     Thinks beyond the immediate task in hand and considers the impact of decisions further down the line     Challenges existing working practices and suggests improvements     Identifies patterns and trends and recommends action     Provides in-depth analysis of problems and proposes solutions     Brings others in to contribute to solutions     Fosters the development of new ideas in others         Commercial Awareness and Acumen         Understanding the importance of financial success and the willingness or ability to act in the interest of achieving it; negotiating the best terms for Black & White; managing legal and contractual aspects; and desiring to work efficiently, as time is money.     Ensures Black & White competes effectively through a thorough understanding of external market conditions (fees, scope of service, conditions)     Includes contingency allowances in negotiated fees/costs/budgets     Benchmarks fees or costs against market rates     Works to minimise costs and risks, and maximise income     Demonstrates good commercial judgement, evaluating risks and making recommendations to reject commercially unattractive opportunities     Negotiates most favourable contractual and financial terms and conditions with customers or suppliers     Considers alternative fee structures, minimizes or caps the liability of Black & White in any agreement     Knows what the One Global Team approach can offer and promotes this to the customers     Understands Black & White s financial bidding processes and complies with them     Delegates work to achieve best value     Tenaciously chases cash for own projects         Building Customer/Client Relationships         The desire to delight customers (may be other individuals or offices within Black & White) by concentrating on discovering, understanding, and satisfying needs; networking, bringing people, opportunities, and activities together; and arranging win/win solutions.     Acts with integrity, is straight-talking, respectful, and fair     Liaises with customers, keeps them informed, seeks feedback, listens to complaints and praise, manages expectations, and responds appropriately     Keeps in touch with customers between projects     Tailors service offered to customers needs (real and perceived)     Is firm with customers when appropriate without causing unnecessary confrontation     Identifies influencers and decision makers     Thinks of how a person can be of value to other people they know     Invests own time in fostering relationships with external business associates     Proactively looks for potential issues and activities in terms of public relations         Communication         Receiving, interpreting, and imparting information and ideas, both written and spoken, to a wide range of people, influencing others.     Uses every means (visual aids, working models, etc.) to make presentations exciting and interesting     Identifies the key issues and communicates them concisely and simply     Uses language appropriate to the audience e.g., does not use technical or professional jargon when communicating with people from different disciplines or professions     Adapts communication to other cultural styles     Asks questions to ensure others have understood what they need to do     Explains complex concepts in simple terms     Persuades through debate and logical argument in a non- adversarial way     When appropriate, tells people honestly and positively things they don t want to know     Communicates appropriately sensitive and confidential matters between staff     Mediates disagreements between parties and negotiates work that compromises the benefit of all         Teamwork and Leadership         Working in a group in a complementary fashion, which when effective, produces a holistic solution; liaising and cooperating with others; and being aware of own and others strengths and weaknesses.     Treats everyone with respect, irrespective of their level, background, gender, or discipline or profession     Supports others, even when they have made mistakes     Identifies and actions training needs (own and others)     Motivates without formal authority e.g., initiatives spanning across several groups     Spots when tasks or projects are going off the rails and intervenes or assists in good time     Deals with people s issues fairly and consistently     Strengthens team by incorporating specialists     Incorporates existing staff into the team even if they have less than an ideal profile     Actively supports and implements business or management systems           Our Values         Accountability: Everyone is accountable.     Integrity: We are straight-talking, respectful, and fair.     Simplicity: Both in our approach and solutions.     Supportive: We are approachable, inclusive, and we recognise success.     Quality: We strive to get it right first time, every time.             Our Strategic Themes         Client first     One Global Team     Employer of Choice     Growth     Innovation

development, from initial planning and feasibility studies to installation and maintenance        Responsibilities:        Design Support: Collaborate with senior engineers to create preliminary designs and layouts for solar power systems based on project requirements and site assessments      Feasibility Studies: Assist in conducting feasibility studies to assess the suitability of sites for solar installations, considering factors such as solar resource availability, land characteristics, and regulatory requirements      Technical Analysis: Conduct technical analysis using software tools to optimize system performance, including shading analysis, energy yield estimation, and financial modeling      Permitting and Regulatory Compliance: Support the preparation of permit applications and ensure compliance with local, state, and federal regulations governing solar energy projects      Procurement Assistance: Assist in procurement activities by preparing specifications, obtaining quotes from vendors, and evaluating equipment options for solar panels, inverters, mounting structures, and other components      Project Management Support: Aid in project management tasks such as coordinating with contractors, tracking project timelines, and monitoring project budgets      Quality Assurance: Participate in quality assurance processes to ensure that solar installations meet industry standards and specifications      Documentation: Maintain accurate project documentation, including design drawings, technical reports, and project records      Site Visits: Conduct site visits to assess project progress, address technical issues, and provide support during installation and commissioning phases      Continuous Learning: Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in solar energy engineering through self-study and participation in relevant training programs

column2: Role & responsibilities  :   The HVAC Maintenance Engineer is responsible for the installation, maintenance, and repair of heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) systems. This role ensures that all HVAC systems operate efficiently and effectively to provide a comfortable environment in residential, commercial, or industrial settings. The HVAC Maintenance Engineer also performs regular inspections, troubleshoots system issues, and complies with safety and environmental regulations. Key Responsibilities: Installation and Maintenance: Install, maintain, and repair HVAC systems including air conditioning units, furnaces, heat pumps, and refrigeration units. Perform routine preventive maintenance to ensure HVAC systems operate at optimal efficiency. Replace or repair defective parts such as motors, compressors, switches, thermostats, and electrical wiring. System Inspection and Troubleshooting: Conduct regular inspections of HVAC systems and components to identify issues and potential hazards. Diagnose mechanical and electrical faults in HVAC systems and determine appropriate corrective actions. Test system operations to verify performance and compliance with specifications. Technical Support: Provide technical guidance and support to junior technicians and apprentices. Assist in developing maintenance schedules and procedures. Keep up-to-date with the latest HVAC technologies and industry best practices. Documentation and Compliance: Maintain accurate records of all maintenance activities, including service reports and parts inventory. Ensure compliance with local, state, and federal regulations regarding HVAC system installation and maintenance. Adhere to safety protocols and guidelines to prevent accidents and injuries. Preferred candidate profile     Experience: Minimum of 3-7 years of experience in HVAC maintenance and repair. Experience with both commercial and residential HVAC systems is preferred. Skills: Strong understanding of HVAC systems, components, and operation principles. Proficiency in using diagnostic tools and equipment. Ability to read and interpret blueprints, schematics, and technical manuals. Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills. Strong communication and customer service skills.
